entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 5:16 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:16 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
